document_data.name: Andizen
document_data.mainbody: King '''Andizen''' was a king of [[Solon]] during the Solonese Empire.

History.Legacy: After Tiphera slew Sturykazzynar, King Andizen honored her as a hero, and had her remains and helmet interred in a lavish tomb, [[Tiphera's mausoleum]].

document_data.Rumors & Legends: By {{yearlink|1372}}, the specifics of his actions became ever more obscure; almost none knew that the mausoleum had been his idea, or that he betrayed Tiphera. He was more known for his jealousy of her fame, and especially for sending her father to guard the dangerous frontier.
